intro: Argostemma neesianum, commonly known as the New Zealand argostemma, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and small, white or pale pink flowers. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a glossy appearance. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest undergrowth.
